Here's a bit of introspective thoughts for both of you:
All this SJW stuff, tumblr drama and so forth will eventually become nothing more than faded memories and deleted data.  What is the point in SJW or trying to combat them if sometime in the future you will completely forget about it entirely and the reasons for their existence and the movement against them will eventually be forgotten as well?
